name: Christine Khachatryan
description: Christine is a PR & Communications Manager at Atomic, with a background in journalism and linguistics. Optimistic by nature and greedy about life, she loves broadening her horizons and always up for new experiences and challenges. In crypto since 2019, fascinated by the potential of blockchain technology to free people financially and restructure all other aspects of our lives in a smart, transparent, and easy manner.
